experience: You and Ryan both know Josh Stomel, Jody Mulkey, and 86 others
This is what I love about working at Google.

So honored to host #robotics students from my hometown of #Compton to check out where I work. Thanks COMPTON UNIFIED SCHOOL DISTRICT for training up the next generation of diverse computer scientists and engineers!
Life At Google, Melissa Marsman-Zaucha, Alvaro Brito
Developing & implementing a white-box AI solution leveraging Nonlinear Symbolic Regression.
Local Compute/Job Engine (HashiCorp Consul Nomad): https://github.com/rms1000watt/local-hashicorp-stackGolang API Generator (Protobuf REST): https://github.com/rms1000watt/degeneres
Software Engineering: Golang, React, Couchbase, MySQL, Bash, MakeDevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Docker Compose, Docker Swarm, AWS ECS
API Development and DevOps: Networking infrastructure, continuous integration, virtualization/management of VMs, high availability servers, zero downtime systems, etc.

Interfacing, Integrating, Monitoring and Testing: Developing scripts to provide seamless communication between heterogenous software and operating systems across the entire development stack for local and remote servers. Standardizing development pipelines through virtualization and optimization. Providing solutions for real-time monitoring of software & hardware. Developing best-practices for load-testing of backend to optimize server configuration prior to deployments.

recommendations: April 18, 2017, Ryan reported directly to Chad

Chad is fantastic leader, through and though. It was an honor working with him on multiple projects. He'd give us the tech vision and architecture then let us go to town developing the software. It was always satisfying being able to "own" the software to that degree. Not to mention, he also taught us how to implement cutting edge tech while satisfying strict compliance regulations. In short, I'd take any opportunity I can to work with Chad again.

summary: Data Scientist at Lantern Credit implementing a white-box Machine Learning solution leveraging Nonlinear Symbolic Regression. About Me:  - I've assembled and configured infrastructure from bare metal installations to automated cloud deployments.   - I've built software with cutting edge languages and tools for analytics applications and businesses.   - I've developed simulations for dielectrophoresis, fluid dynamic, particle systems and nano-scale, meta-material antenna arrays. - I stay up to date deploying Spark + Hadoop technologies in containerized (Docker) environments. - I investigate Kaggle datasets using Python in my spare time.- I'm on an eternal quest for knowledge. Let's connect and discuss data!
name: Ryan Smith
